Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Writer: Stefan Zweig (inspired by the writings of), Wes Anderson (story), Hugo Guinness (story), Wes Anderson (screenplay)
Actors: Ralph Fiennes, F. Murray Abraham, Mathieu Amalric, Adrien Brody
Plot: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous Hungarian hotel between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.
